doc.title: Kipper Williams: Berlusconi's dignified exit from parliament
doc.author: Guardian staff reporter
doc.description: Embattled Italian PM failed to win enough support to show he still controls the lower house of parliament

main.p: Berlusconi's dignified exit from Italian parliamentEmbattled Italian PM failed to win enough support to show he still controls the lower house of parliament Kipper Williams Berlusconi vote:09.11.2011 Illustration: GuardianKipper Williams Berlusconi vote:09.11.2011 Illustration: GuardianExplore more on these topicsEurozone crisisKipper WilliamsItalySilvio Berlusconi
